resources.string: The new version is signed with a different key to the old one. To install the new version, the old one must be uninstalled first. Please do this and try again. (Note that uninstalling will erase any internal data stored by the application)

All other repos didn\'t create errors.

This app tracks and reports your activity
The upstream source code is not entirely Free
Turbo Store™, is a digital distribution platform for Turbo OS™ and Android™

%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Google Play services requires an action
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Show icons at a smaller size
Copying app icons into the repo…
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
No apps in this category.\n\nTry selecting a different category or updating your repositories to get a fresh list of apps.
All apps up to date.\n\nCongratulations! All of your apps are up to date (or your repositories are out of date).

No apps installed.\n\nThere are apps on your device, but they are not available from TurboStore. This could be because you need to update your repositories, or the repositories genuinely don\'t have your apps available.
No apps available to swap.\n\nEither the device you are swapping with didn\'t offer any apps to swap, or an error occurred while communicating with it.
Configure HTTP Proxy for all network requests
Show extra info and enable extra settings
Failed to create the repo index!
Always include apps that require touchscreen
You are trying to downgrade this application. Doing so might get it to malfunction and even lose your data. Do you want to try and downgrade it anyway?
It seems like this package is not compatible with your device. Do you want to try and install it anyway?
Do you want to install this application? It will get access to:
Do you want to install this application? It does not require any special access.
Do you want to install an update to this existing application? Your existing data will not be lost. The updated application will get access to:
Do you want to install an update to this existing application? Your existing data will not be lost. It does not require any special access.
Do you want to install an update to this built-in application? Your existing data will not be lost. The updated application will get access to:
Do you want to install an update to this built-in application? Your existing data will not be lost. It does not require any special access.
Failed to install due to an unknown error
This is not a valid URL.
Advertise your local repo using Bonjour (mDNS)
Use encrypted HTTPS:// connection for local repo
The advertised title of your local repo: %s
You don\'t have any available app that can handle %s

You don't have any repositories configured!

A repository is a source of applications. To add one, press the MENU button now and enter the URL.

A repository address looks something like this: https://phonemetra.com/repo
Your device is not on the same WiFi as the local repo you just added! Try joining this network: %s

The official Phonemetra repository. Applications in this repository are mostly built directory from the source code. Some are official binaries built by the original application developers - these will be replaced by source-built versions over time.
Scan this QR Code to connect to the website for getting started.
Scan this QR Code to connect to the same WiFi network as this device.
The list of used repositories has changed.\nDo you want to update them?
Deleting a repository means apps from it will no longer be available from TurboStore.\n\nNote: All previously installed apps will remain on your device.
Do you want to delete the \"{0}\" repository, which has {1} apps in it? Any installed apps will NOT be removed, but you will not be able to update them through TurboStore any more.
You must first delete this repo before you can add one with a different key.
Disabled "%1$s".\n\nYou will need to re-enable this repository to install apps from it.
This repo is already setup, this will add new key information.
The incoming repo is already setup and enabled.
This repo is already setup, confirm that you want to re-enable it.
This repository has not been used yet. In order to view the apps it provides, you will need to update it.\n\nOnce updated, the description and other details will become available here.
All repositories are up to date
Either your Android device is not rooted or you have denied root access for TurboStore.
Do not grey out apps requiring root privileges
To connect to other people\'s devices, make sure both devices are on the same WiFi network. Then either type the URL above into TurboStore, or scan this QR Code:
Show app versions incompatible with the device
Checking apps compatibility with your device…
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
Do you want to get apps from %1$s now?
Your mobile device becomes an app store with Swap!
Join the same Wifi as your friend
Help your friend join your hotspot
If your friend has TurboStore and NFC turned on touch your phones together.
An error occurred while attempting to swap with another device. We will still try to get apps from them, but they may not be able to get apps from us.
One person needs to scan the code, or type the URL of the other swapper into a browser.
(Tap to switch to a WiFi network)
Tap an app for details and to install.
Tap to select the apps you want to swap.

Looks like you have root access on your device. You can now install TurboStore as a privileged app, tightly coupled with the Android operating system. This allows TurboStore to install, upgrade and uninstall apps on its own.

Touch to install TurboStore as a privileged app, tightly coupled with the Android operating system. This allows TurboStore to install, upgrade and uninstall apps on its own.\nYou can also do this later from TurboStore\'s preferences.
Installation as a privileged app failed
The installation of TurboStore as a privileged app failed. The installation method is not supported by all Android distributions, please consult the TurboStore bug tracker for more information.
Successful installation as a privileged app
TurboStore has been successfully installed as a privileged app. This allows TurboStore to install, upgrade and uninstall apps on its own.
Do you want to install TurboStore as a privileged app?\nThis takes up to 10 seconds where no user interface is shown.
Do you want to install TurboStore as a privileged app?\nThis takes up to 10 seconds where no user interface is shown and the device will be rebooted afterwards.
Use privileged permissions to install, update, and remove packages
This option is only available when TurboStore is installed as a privileged app.
Do you want to uninstall TurboStore?
Touch to view details and allow others to swap your apps.
Touch to turn off your local repo.
Touch to turn on your local repo.
Do you want to uninstall this app?
Failed to uninstall due to an unknown error
Uninstall TurboStore when installed as a privileged app
Do you want to replace this app with the factory version?
This means that the list of applications could not be verified. You should be careful with applications downloaded from unsigned indexes.
